title: Fallen Angel 1945 colorized (Dana Andrews, Alice Faye, Linda Darnell)

sources.title: Fallen Angel 1945 Colorized
sources.description: A wealthy woman in a small town (Alice Faye) falls in love with a slick con man (Dana Andrews) and marries him, even though his plan is to take her money and run off with a pretty waitress (Linda Darnell). When the waitress is mysteriously murdered, she nevertheless helps him in his effort to avoid the police and find out who's responsible. Alice Faye as June Mills Dana Andrews as Eric Stanton Linda Darnell as Stella Charles Bickford as Mark Judd Anne Revere as Clara Mills Percy Kilbride as Pop Bruce Cabot as Dave Atkins If you have a request or a comment for me, please go to the Colorized Movies Forum at https://archive.org/details/colorized-movies?tab=forum I colorized this using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural. Hopefully a more professional job will be done someday.
